title: Drawing, "Design for a Panel with Portrait of a Nobleman", ca. 1750
medium: Brush and gray wash, pen and black ink, black chalk on paper
inscribed: On verso in pen: "Fran di Mura
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Museum general Frund and Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectabgle .  Hald length portrait of a man in armor sketched within an oval frame.  Decoration of the surorunding verical panel includes trophy of armds, two putti, masks at top and bottom and a build excutcheon sumounted by a crown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Panel with Portrait of a Nobleman", ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Brush and gray wash, pen and black ink, black chalk on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7068.
